glosses: sleeve (part of a garment that covers the arm)
a flower petal, often colored, that forms a covering over the flowers in plant families such as the Asteraceae, Banana, etc.

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یك (yeñ, “sleeve”), from Old Anatolian Turkish یك (yẹŋ), from Proto-Turkic *yẹŋ (“sleeve”).

Azerbaijani yen
Bashkir ең (yeñ)

Crimean Tatar yeñ, енъ

Kazakh жең (jeñ)
